mapper.sql: WAHOCE_ID, WAHO_ID, WAHOCE_NUMBER, WAHOCE_SIZE, WAHOCE_IMAGE1, WAHOCE_IMAGE2, WAHOCE_IMAGE3, WAHOCE_STATUS, WAHOCE_INTRODUCE, WAHOCE_TYPE, WAHOCE_PRICE, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE, WAHOCE_DPRICE, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE, CABINET_ID, WAHOCE_KIND
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
insert into WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL (WAHOCE_ID, WAHO_ID, WAHOCE_NUMBER, WAHOCE_SIZE, WAHOCE_IMAGE1, WAHOCE_IMAGE2, WAHOCE_IMAGE3, WAHOCE_STATUS, WAHOCE_INTRODUCE, WAHOCE_TYPE, WAHOCE_PRICE, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE, WAHOCE_DPRICE, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE, CABINET_ID, WAHOCE_KIND) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wahoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discountDprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cabinetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select sys_guid() from dual

WAHOCE_ID,
WAHO_ID,
WAHOCE_NUMBER,
WAHOCE_SIZE,

CABINET_ID,

mapper.update:
update WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL
WAHOCE_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHO_ID = #{record.wahoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_NUMBER = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_SIZE = #{record.size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE1 = #{record.image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE2 = #{record.image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE3 = #{record.image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_INTRODUCE = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{record.discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DPRICE = #{record.dprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE = #{record.discountDprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABINET_ID = #{record.cabinetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_KIND = #{record.kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL set WAHOCE_ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHO_ID = #{record.wahoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_NUMBER = #{record.number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_SIZE = #{record.size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE1 = #{record.image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE2 = #{record.image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE3 = #{record.image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_INTRODUCE = #{record.introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_PRICE = #{record.price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{record.discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DPRICE = #{record.dprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE = #{record.discountDprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABINET_ID = #{record.cabinetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_KIND = #{record.kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL
WAHO_ID = #{wahoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_IMAGE3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DPRICE = #{dprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE = #{discountDprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABINET_ID = #{cabinetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAHOCE_KIND = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where WAHOCE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WHC_WAREHOUSE_CELL set WAHO_ID = #{wahoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_SIZE = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_IMAGE3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_INTRODUCE = #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_PRICE = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DPRICE = #{dprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_DISCOUNT_DPRICE = #{discountDprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABINET_ID = #{cabinetId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAHOCE_KIND = #{kind,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where WAHOCE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: with ware as ( select t.wahoce_id waceId, t.waho_id wahoId, t.wahoce_number wahoceNumber, t.wahoce_size wahoceSize, case when t.cabinet_id is null then '1' else t.wahoce_status end as wahoceStatus, t.wahoce_type wahoceTpe, t.wahoce_Kind wahoceKind from whc_warehouse_cell t ) select count(wa.wahoceSize) as "allCabi", count(case when wa.wahoceSize = '1' then '1' end) as "smaCabi", count(case when wa.wahoceSize = '2' then '2' end) as "medCabi", count(case when wa.wahoceSize = '3' then '3' end) as "bigCabi" from ware wa where wa.wahoceStatus = '0' and wahoceKind='1' and wahoId=#{wahoId}

select * from( select t.wahoce_id as "waceId", t.waho_id as "wahoId", t.wahoce_number as "wahoceNumber", t.wahoce_size as "wahoceSize", case when t.cabinet_id is null then '1' else t.wahoce_status end as "wahoceStatus", t.wahoce_type as "wahoceTpe", t.wahoce_Kind as "wahoceKind", waty.waty_name as "wahoceName", case when t.wahoce_size='1' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."imwapr_size1_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='2' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."imwapr_size2_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='3' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."imwapr_size3_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='4' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."imwapr_size4_price"),'990.99') else '' end as "waceTimePrice"
from ( select * from whc_warehouse_cell c where c.waho_id=#{wahoId} and c.wahoce_type ='8' ) t left join ( select min(t.imwapr_size1_price)as "imwapr_size1_price",min(t.imwapr_size2_price) as "imwapr_size2_price",min(t.imwapr_size3_price) as "imwapr_size3_price",min(t.imwapr_size4_price)as "imwapr_size4_price",min(t.waho_id) as "wahoId" from ( select p.waho_id, to_number(p.imwapr_size1_price) as imwapr_size1_price, to_number(p.imwapr_size2_price) as imwapr_size2_price, to_number(p.imwapr_size3_price) as imwapr_size3_price, to_number(p.imwapr_size4_price) as imwapr_size4_price from whc_immediate_wahoce_price p where p.waho_id=#{wahoId} )t) p on p."wahoId"=t.waho_id left join whc_wahoce_type waty on waty.waty_code = t.wahoce_type union all
select t.wahoce_id as "waceId", t.waho_id as "wahoId", t.wahoce_number as "wahoceNumber", t.wahoce_size as "wahoceSize", case when t.cabinet_id is null then '3' else t.wahoce_status end as "wahoceStatus", t.wahoce_type as "wahoceTpe", t.wahoce_Kind as "wahoceKind", waty.waty_name as "wahoceName", case when t.wahoce_size='1' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."inwapr_size1_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='2' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."inwapr_size2_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='3' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."inwapr_size3_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='4' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."inwapr_size4_price"),'990.99') when t.wahoce_size='5' then TO_CHAR(to_number(p."inwapr_size5_price"),'990.99') else '' end as "waceTimePrice" from ( select * from whc_warehouse_cell c where c.waho_id=#{wahoId} and c.wahoce_type ='10' ) t left join ( select min(t.inwapr_size1_price)as "inwapr_size1_price",min(t.inwapr_size2_price) as "inwapr_size2_price",min(t.inwapr_size3_price) as "inwapr_size3_price",min(t.inwapr_size4_price)as "inwapr_size4_price",min(t.inwapr_size5_price)as "inwapr_size5_price",min(t.waho_id) as "wahoId" from ( select p.waho_id, to_number(p.inwapr_size1_price) as inwapr_size1_price, to_number(p.inwapr_size2_price) as inwapr_size2_price, to_number(p.inwapr_size3_price) as inwapr_size3_price, to_number(p.inwapr_size4_price) as inwapr_size4_price, to_number(p.inwapr_size5_price) as inwapr_size5_price from whc_intelligence_wahoce_price p where p.waho_id=#{wahoId} )t) p on p."wahoId"=t.waho_id left join whc_wahoce_type waty on waty.waty_code = t.wahoce_type )t1 order by t1."wahoceTpe", to_number(REGEXP_REPLACE(t1."wahoceNumber",'[^0-9]',''))

select ww.waho_id as "wahoId", ww.waho_name as "wahoName", wwa.wahoce_number as "wahoceNumber", wwa.wahoce_id as "wahoceId", wwa.wahoce_size as "wahoceSize", ww.waho_hour_renew as "hourRenew", ww.waho_hour_start as "hourStart", ww.waho_day_renew as "dayRenew", ww.waho_day_start as "dayStart", ww.waho_month_renew as "monthRenew", ww.waho_month_start as "monthStart", ww.waho_adv1 as "adv1", ww.waho_adv2 as "adv2", ww.waho_adv3 as "adv3", ww.WAHO_TYPE as "wahoType" from whc_warehouse_cell wwa left join whc_warehouse ww on wwa.waho_id=ww.waho_id where 1=1 and wwa.wahoce_id=#{wahoceId}

select wv.VOUCHER_ID as "voucherId", wv.voucher_code as "voucherCode", wv.voucher_unit as "voucherUnit", wv.voucher_amount as "voucherAmount", wv.MEMBER_ID as "memberId" from whc_voucher wv where 1=1 and wv.MEMBER_ID in (select wm.MEMBER_ID as "meberId" from whc_member wm where 1=1 and wm.open_id=#{openId} ) and wv.voucher_status = '3' order by wv.voucher_create_time
select c.waho_id as "wahoId",c.wahoce_status as "status" from whc_warehouse_cell c where c.wahoce_id=#{wahoceId}
